segments.text: What is your long term career plan you set for yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First of all , I hope to spend a few years working in some famous companies to command a skill , to set a solid foundation and to build my interpersonal network . When I feel I have accumulated enough experience , I hope to own an undertaking . Of course this is up to the situation then and the opportunities the companies offer me . In the long run , I hope to be an entrepreneur .
segments.speaker: S2
